metadata.dc:author: Hernández-Gordillo, Daniel
García-Lamas, Leopoldo
González-Pliego, José Angel
Guzmán-Sánchez, César Manuel
Castañeda-Barragán, Edgar
metadata.dc:description: The purpose of this review is to analyse the relation between obstructive sleep apnea and coronary disease. We present epidemiological data on the respiratory disorder and its association with ischemic cardiopathy, as well as common cardiovascular risk factors, physiopathological interactions between both conditions, clinical evolution and impact of treatment on prognosis.
metadata.dc:subject: Ischemic heart disease
Enfermedad arterial coronaria

Síndrome coronario agudo

Mexico
México

Coronary artery disease
Apnea obstructiva del sueño
metadata.dc:title: Apnea obstructiva del sueño y cardiopatía isquémica. Las evidencias de su relación.
[Obstructive sleep apnea syndrome and ischemic heart disease. Evidence of their relationship].
